Docs.summary: Allows you to obtain the full path of the source file that contains the caller. This is the file path at the time of compile.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You apply the `CallerFilePath` attribute to an optional parameter that has a default value. You must specify an explicit default value for the optional parameter. You can't apply this attribute to parameters that aren't specified as optional.
For more information, see [Caller Information](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9cb2b8c0-c4f6-44b8-9c90-38948455b373).
